definition: apprentice/disciple
disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence
surname Tu
variant of 悌[ti4]
younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)

sentences.chinese: 杜库等待着，注视着他的徒弟。

sentences.english: This person, is my disciple, Mark Lee.
sentences.chinese: 这个人，我的徒弟，李国煌。

sentences.english: They don't trust many to be trackers. Or to be apprentices.
sentences.chinese: 他们不信任很多人去做追踪者，或者是做一个徒弟。

sentences.english: Soon Xanatos becomes Qui-Gon's first apprentice.
sentences.chinese: 很快，萨那托斯成了魁刚第一个徒弟。

sentences.english: Ginger President to come to the end, refuse to the loss of wild dont teach disciples.
sentences.chinese: 姜会长以年老体衰，教不了徒弟为由拒绝了失野。

sentences.english: The apprentice is always lazing about doing nothing.
sentences.chinese: 这个徒弟老在闲荡，什么事也不干。

sentences.english: The Teacher knew from the beginning that his little student could not live very long.
sentences.chinese: 从一开始他就知道他的小徒弟活不了多久。

sentences.english: As master craft workers, they imparted the knowledge of their trades to apprentices and journeymen.
sentences.chinese: 作为师傅，工匠们将自己的手艺传授给徒弟和雇工。

sentences.english: He has two good apprentices working with him.
He was an apprentice to a master craftsman.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位能工巧匠的徒弟。

sentences.english: His father apprenticed him to a barber.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲送他去当理发师的徒弟。

sentences.english: Gongsun Long took the man as his disciple.
sentences.chinese: 于是公孙龙收那人做徒弟。

sentences.english: Mui C-fu has many students. This time she brought along her new student, Samuel Pang.
sentences.chinese: 梅师傅徒儿众多，此番带来了她的新徒弟彭敬慈。

sentences.english: The first ever to master the thousand scrolls of kungfu.
sentences.chinese: 他是有史以来第一个学会了师傅千般武艺的徒弟。

sentences.english: His apprentice always leaves the tools about.
sentences.chinese: 他的徒弟老是乱放工具。

sentences.english: That is correct. I am Mr. Zhao's apprentice at present.
sentences.chinese: 没错，我现在是赵先生的徒弟。

definition: used for 師傅|师傅 (in Taiwan)/master/qualified worker
last disciple of a master
disciple/follower
to formally become an apprentice to a master
master and disciple
fellow apprentices/fellow students (male)
master/qualified worker/respectful form of address for older men/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
adopted son (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
senior male fellow student or apprentice/son (older than oneself) of one's teacher
adopted son
young disciple (of the same master)/younger or junior male schoolmate
adopted daughter (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
to learn a skill or art
brilliant student
term of respect for your teacher's wife
favorite pupil
